_comments.lazy: Rank ID to be treated as the one for inactive person
_comments.lazytime: Time required to be in the above rank to be suggested for a kick in days
_comments.lazyover: Time to ignore rank checks if member is lazy in days
_comments.newbie: Time for member to be treated as new in days
_comments.rankotime: Time to show rank up\down overlay in days
_comments.rankchage: Limit the time between rank changes in days
_comments.lvlchange: Limit the time to show that level has changed in days
_comments.lvltrack: Limit the time for tracking level changes in days
_comments.memonline: Number of members to be shown on one line
_comments.hovershadow: Shadow style for hoverable links (activates on hover)
_comments.avashadow: Shadow style for marking avatars on search hit
_comments.fcnamecss: Style of company name. Use for font styling ONLY
_comments.serverncss: Style of server name. Use for font styling ONLY
_comments.formeddate: Style of company foundation date. Use for font styling ONLY
_comments.gctwinadder: Style of grand company names. Use for font styling ONLY
_comments.gcmaelstorm: Style of grand company names. Use for font styling ONLY
_comments.gcimmortalflames: Style of grand company names. Use for font styling ONLY
_comments.estatename: Style of estate names. Use for font styling ONLY
_comments.estateaddress: Style of estate address. Use for font styling ONLY
_comments.ranknum: Style of ranking number. Use for font styling ONLY
_comments.rankmax: Style of max and min ranking number. Use for font styling ONLY
_comments.membercount: Style of members number. Use for font styling ONLY
_comments.membertag: Style of member tag. Use for font styling ONLY
